donate.title: Donate
donate.intro: Bible in One Year is brought to you by Alpha International, home of the Alpha course. Every month, thousands of people are engaging with the Word of God in a quick, simple and relatable way through the Bible in One Year and being introduced to Jesus through an Alpha course. Our ministries are made possible because of the generosity and friendship of people like you. By setting up a regular gift your support could help thousands of people every month to experience and grow in a loving personal relationship with Jesus. Thank you!
